title.narrative: National Biodiversity Strategy in Cook Is

description.narrative: National Biodiversity Planning to Support the implementation of the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) 2011-2020 Strategic Plan in Cook Islands (NBSAP).

This project is part of the second generation of Biodiversity Enabling Activities (BD EA) under the GEF. Cook Islands has been Party to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) since 20 April 1993.

description.narrative: Full Size Project for Cook Islands; " Conserving Biodiversity and Enhancing Ecosystem Functions through a Ridge to Reef Approach in the Cook Islands"

title.narrative: UN Joint Presence & Coordination in Cook Islands

description.narrative: After a study conducted in 2015 about Joint Presence Offices (JPOs) in the Pacific. The UN system agreed to establish JPOs in the Cook Island & Niue to be led by UN Coordination Officers for 3 years (2016-2018).

title.narrative: UN Joint Presence & Coordination in Cook Islands

description.narrative: United Nations agreed to establish a Joint Presence Offices and placing UN Coordination officer in the Cook Islands, this will contribute to the UN development system leadership and coordination.
